VM.content: structure [inside-outside] has no meaning w/out included origin, inscribed eastern horizon which is neither w/in nor w/out space
VM.linkedContent: structure [inside-outside] has no meaning w/out included origin, inscribed eastern horizon which is neither w/in nor w/out space

S.content: most matutinal in Frühe, of promise, an other birth, other essence, hétérogène à l’origine, foreign to Christianity w/out being opposed to it, even more radically foreign to Platonic metaphysics
S.linkedContent: most matutinal in Frühe, of promise, an other birth, other essence, hétérogène à l’origine, foreign to Christianity w/out being opposed to it, even more radically foreign to Platonic metaphysics

WM.content: the East is where the sensible sun rises, the sun sets, is interiorized, in heart (eye) of the West
WM.linkedContent: the East is where the sensible sun rises, the sun sets, is interiorized, in heart (eye) of the West

FS.content: “pure book turns toward Eastern edge of this absence [Blanchot’s pure absence]…is its first and proper content”
FS.linkedContent: “pure book turns toward Eastern edge of this absence [Blanchot’s pure absence]…is its first and proper content”

Gii.content: savage second blow of sexual difference, its Verwesung, vs. originary, tender sexual difference > Heidegger claims this schema is not Christian/Platonic, but it has no other content and even no other language than Platonism/Christianity > its archi-matinal origin, ultra-Western horizon, constituted by hollow of a repetition, same for Verfall, Ruf, Sorge in structure of Dasein
Gii.linkedContent: savage second blow of sexual difference, its Verwesung, vs. originary, tender sexual difference > Heidegger claims this schema is not Christian/Platonic, but it has no other content and even no other language than Platonism/Christianity > its archi-matinal origin, ultra-Western horizon, constituted by hollow of a repetition, same for Verfall, Ruf, Sorge in structure of Dasein

TN.content: reflexivity of se toucher toi of 2 borders (bords) does not submit to logic of mirror, speculum
TN.linkedContent: reflexivity of se toucher toi of 2 borders (bords) does not submit to logic of mirror, speculum

TN.content: eyes touch btwn 2 orients: invisible eye (touchable), seeing eye (untouchable)
TN.linkedContent: eyes touch btwn 2 orients: invisible eye (touchable), seeing eye (untouchable)

OG.content: acc. Hegel, writing (an Umweg) betrays life/breath > finitude/paralysis, sterilizes spirit, principle of difference/death in becoming of being (is to speech, what China is to Europe)
OG.linkedContent: acc. Hegel, writing (an Umweg) betrays life/breath > finitude/paralysis, sterilizes spirit, principle of difference/death in becoming of being (is to speech, what China is to Europe)

OG.content: orientation is a disorientation, the structure of language; Rousseau’s geography of language: oriented toward its origin comme à son orient > occident as la fin, la chute, la cadence, l’échéance, la mort, la nuit
OG.linkedContent: orientation is a disorientation, the structure of language; Rousseau’s geography of language: oriented toward its origin comme à son orient > occident as la fin, la chute, la cadence, l’échéance, la mort, la nuit

OG.content: Rousseau: to judge Orientals from books, to paint a portrait of corpse > oriental corpse is in the book, ours is already in our speech
OG.linkedContent: Rousseau: to judge Orientals from books, to paint a portrait of corpse > oriental corpse is in the book, ours is already in our speech

CHOR.content: questions of representation [of women] always too old & as yet to be born, overloaded w/ hieroglyphs & still as virgin as origin, like early morning in East
CHOR.linkedContent: questions of representation [of women] always too old & as yet to be born, overloaded w/ hieroglyphs & still as virgin as origin, like early morning in East
